alert.note: Alert for El Paso; Teller (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Air Quality Alert issued May 23 at 4:10PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...AIR QUALITY HEALTH ADVISORY FOR MULTIPLE POLLUTANTS FROM 700 AM TUESDAY UNTIL 1000 PM TUESDAY... The Colorado Department of Public Health and Environment has issued the following... WHAT...Air Quality Health Advisory for Multiple Pollutants. WHERE...Teller and El Paso Counties. Locations include, but are not limited to Cripple Creek, Florissant, Manitou Springs and Colorado Springs. WHEN...700 AM Tuesday May 23 to 1000 PM Tuesday May 23 IMPACTS...Wildfire smoke continues across the area and both ozone and fine particulate concentrations could reach the Unhealthy for Sensitive Groups category. Pollutant levels should decrease by late Tuesday evening as showers and thunderstorms develop over the advisory area. HEALTH INFORMATION...Public Health Recommendations: Increasing likelihood of respiratory symptoms in sensitive individuals, aggravation of heart or lung disease and premature mortality in people with cardiopulmonary disease and older adults. People with heart or lung disease, older adults, and children should reduce prolonged or heavy exertion.
